ygData.subject: Re: A pred inside Maxi's base (Kitkat)
ygData.msgSnippet: Well as much as I d love to chat, I have things to do. With that, Shadowcaster turned to exit the base, transformed to his TM3 Panther form and exited the

"Well as much as I'd love to chat, I have things to
do."

With that, Shadowcaster turned to exit the base,
transformed to his TM3 Panther form and exited the
base.
 --- Nic <Proudwing500k@...> wrote: 
---------------------------------
Blackfang lifted a finger to interrupt.

Blackfang: While you guys finish talking, I'll go get
some stuff and 
wait in the mess. See you later, KitKat.

He left and went down in the Arsenal, picked up a
large laser rifle 
and two grenades, then went to the Mess.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Polar Claw
<cycodrone@y...> wrote:
> Shadowcaster adimred this bot's spunk, but he knew
she
> seriously had no idea of who she was dealing with.
> 
> "Considering that I've been online since just before
> the great uprising, I'd say it's safe to say I've
> destroyed more installations and ruined more
> operations than the number of cycles you've been
> online. Besides, I thought you greatly revered we
> ancient Decepticons?" the last part was said with a
> real sneer.
> 
>  --- shadowess_azogoth <shadowess_azogoth@y...>
> wrote: 
> ---------------------------------
> KitKat::
> 
> Her ears perked up at Shadowcaster. She turned her
> head so he could 
> hear her,"I've turned more bots into paperclips than
> you've had hot 
> meals bot."  She then looked at Blackfang, "See, a
> pred at spark." 
> with a mischievious grin. 
> 
>

> <cycodrone@y...> wrote:
> > Shadowcaster turned around to face Blackfang,
> relieved

> on

> >

a

> this
> > shhoting acusing liooks at Kup, Windlord and at
> > Kitkat.
> >

> >

> > didn't damage her." 
> > 
> > Then feeling a little humor was required, he adds
> with
> > a somewhat surprisingly flippent tone,
> > 
> > "Don't worry Fang, as Ravage once said to
Wheeljack,
> > if I wanted her dead, she'd be paperclips by now."
> >

> find

nods
> at

> > Kup). If you allow, I can take care of her.

> > least not in her

> in
> > her eyes.
> > 
> > Blackfang: Hello KitKat... Do you remember me?

> gently

into

> started
> > > scrambling to get 
> > > out of his arms. "LET ME GO! I KNEW YOU WOULD
TRY
> TO
> > > TORTURE ME! "  
> > > SHe struggled and squirmed trying to get out of
> his
> > > grip. "MAXIMALS 
> > > ARE AS TRETCHEROUS AS PREDACONS!"  She struggled
> > hard,
> > > but his grip 
> > > was firm.  She stopped as she felt her body
reach
> > low
> > > energy levels. 
> > > She looked up at him as she lay in his arms, "Go
> > > ahead, kill me. Send 
> > > me to the pit for all I care. I'll just come
back
> > > again. The matrix 
> > > hates me. So I shall never know peace." She was
> > still
> > > in wolf mode 
> > > and taking deep breaths. She almost felt like
> > crying,
> > > but a warrior 
> > > can never show true emotion or they show they
are
> > > weak. She wimpered 
> > > once and then stopped. She lay still and waited
> for
> > > the bot to crush 
> > > her.  
> > > 
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Polar Claw
> > > <cycodrone@y...> wrote:
> > > > Shadowcaster couldn't believe how childish
> > everyone
> > > > was acting- even beginning to wonder just how

> > > > could have been so patient with his children
> when
> > > they
> > > > clearly needed to grow up. He grabs Kitkat
with
> > > > lightning speed in him hand (he's the size of
> > > Optimal
> > > > Optimus) and stares her down, making it clear
> that
> > > > enough is enough.
> > > >

> COMMIT
> > > > MASSIVE TEMPORAL BUTCHERING IN THIS TIME AND

STAND

would
> > > never

go.

> > > > She transformed into bot mode. Her sleek and

> > > was
> > > > still behind

> her
> > > > elegent hands on

> > > > thing, why save 
> > > > me if I'm a pred and your a maximal? Even if
we
> > have
> > > > an allience, we 
> > > > are still and will always be eternal enemies.
So

> > > > make sence."  She thought about it some more.
> > > "Unless
> > > > we have a 
> > > > common enemy that is so great we need every
bot
> we
